data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
When walking, always face forward. Take the opposite direction of where you were facing before looking again. Steps toward you always have to be face forward. So, the answer is Yes.

You need to take 4 steps back and walk around to return back to your starting point. So, the answer is Yes.

If you first take 7 steps and take 1 step, you are back at the point where you started. So, the answer is Yes.

You would take 5 steps left. So you would take 2 steps left. So you would take 6 steps forward. So in total you would take 4 + 2 + 1 = 9 steps. So the answer is yes.
